text: Magna Carta Holy Grail (sometimes written as Magna Carta... Holy Grail) is the twelfth studio album by American rapper Jay-Z. It was released for digital download on 4 July 2013. It was then released in album form on 8 July 2013 by Roc-A-Fella and Roc Nation while being shared by Universal Records. Justin Timberlake, Nas, Rick Ross, Frank Ocean and Beyoncé also sang in the album. The album was promoted with commercials that were presented by Samsung. Even though some critics didn't like the album, it still reached #1 on the American, British, Swiss and Canadian music charts. It debuted at #1 on the US Billboard 200 Chart. == Songs == # Holy Grail (with Justin Timberlake) # Picasso Baby # Tom Ford # FuckWithMeYouKnowIGotIt (with Rick Ross) # Oceans (with Frank Ocean) # F.U.T.V. # SomewhereInAmerica # Crown # Heaven # Versus # Part II (On the Run) (with Beyoncé) # Beach Is Better # BBC # JAY Z Blue # La Familia # Nickels and Dimes == References == == Other websites == * Magna Carta Holy Grail on Discogs.com * Magna Carta Holy Grail review on AllMusic.com * Magna Carta Holy Grail review on Los Angeles Times Category:2013 albums Category:Jay-Z Category:Rap music Category:Roc-A-Fella Records albums
title: Magna Carta Holy Grail
